name: ArtiFX
overview:
ArtiFX is a video production company based in Geneva, Switzerland. We are specialized in post-production and underwater movies.

ArtiFX offers a large variety of services relating to video production: creation of videos for companies, commercials, documentaries, short movies, visual effects, etc.
